name: Peng Le
story: Tengfei Tou grew up in a small village in China. His family were farmers, but he always had a fascination with guns and the military. When he turned 18, he joined the Chinese military and quickly rose through the ranks thanks to his natural talent with a rifle. He was eventually recruited to join the special forces and sent on several dangerous missions. Tengfei is married and has two children, but they are currently living with his parents as he is constantly on deployment.
